item.title: about me
item.description: professional creative director/researcher at fractal media graduate researcher at laboratory for intelligent imaging and neural computing academic ph.d. biomedical engineering at columbia university (in progress) m.s. computer science at columbia university b.s. brain and cognitive sciences at university of rochester b.a. economics at university of rochester Contact: Email | GitHub
